channel.title: chatbot on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in chatbot on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Create a chatbot that supports free input with Word2Vec
item.description: This article is the first day article of [Zeals Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/zeals). Nice to meet you. This is Tamaki, who will join Zeals from the next fiscal year. Zeals operates a chatbot technology called chat commerce. Also, I am currently researching natural language processing at university. There are conversations in which bots do not have natural language processing, but I thought it would be interesting to add natural language processing technology to them, so I decided to make this the subject of this article.
